text: "Just a Dream" is a 2010 Pop rap/R&B; song by American rapper and singer Nelly. It was the first single from his sixth studio album 5.0. The song was released on August 16, 2010. The song reached #1 on the U.S. Billboard Pop Songs and #3 on the US Billboard Hot 100. Category:Nelly songs Category:2010 songs
title: Just a Dream
